upgrade.0: The equipping character gains 52% of their Elemental Mastery as bonus ATK. When an Elemental Skill hits opponents, the Dream of the Scarlet Sands effect will be gained for 10s: The equipping character will gain 28% of their Elemental Mastery as bonus ATK. Max 3 stacks.
upgrade.1: The equipping character gains 65% of their Elemental Mastery as bonus ATK. When an Elemental Skill hits opponents, the Dream of the Scarlet Sands effect will be gained for 10s: The equipping character will gain 35% of their Elemental Mastery as bonus ATK. Max 3 stacks.
upgrade.2: The equipping character gains 78% of their Elemental Mastery as bonus ATK. When an Elemental Skill hits opponents, the Dream of the Scarlet Sands effect will be gained for 10s: The equipping character will gain 42% of their Elemental Mastery as bonus ATK. Max 3 stacks.
upgrade.3: The equipping character gains 91% of their Elemental Mastery as bonus ATK. When an Elemental Skill hits opponents, the Dream of the Scarlet Sands effect will be gained for 10s: The equipping character will gain 49% of their Elemental Mastery as bonus ATK. Max 3 stacks.
upgrade.4: The equipping character gains 104% of their Elemental Mastery as bonus ATK. When an Elemental Skill hits opponents, the Dream of the Scarlet Sands effect will be gained for 10s: The equipping character will gain 56% of their Elemental Mastery as bonus ATK. Max 3 stacks.

upgrade.0: 基于装备者元素精通的52%，获得攻击力加成。元素战技命中敌人时，将产生持续10秒的「赤沙之梦」效果：基于装备者元素精通的28%，获得攻击力加成，该效果至多叠加3层。
upgrade.1: 基于装备者元素精通的65%，获得攻击力加成。元素战技命中敌人时，将产生持续10秒的「赤沙之梦」效果：基于装备者元素精通的35%，获得攻击力加成，该效果至多叠加3层。
upgrade.2: 基于装备者元素精通的78%，获得攻击力加成。元素战技命中敌人时，将产生持续10秒的「赤沙之梦」效果：基于装备者元素精通的42%，获得攻击力加成，该效果至多叠加3层。
upgrade.3: 基于装备者元素精通的91%，获得攻击力加成。元素战技命中敌人时，将产生持续10秒的「赤沙之梦」效果：基于装备者元素精通的49%，获得攻击力加成，该效果至多叠加3层。
upgrade.4: 基于装备者元素精通的104%，获得攻击力加成。元素战技命中敌人时，将产生持续10秒的「赤沙之梦」效果：基于装备者元素精通的56%，获得攻击力加成，该效果至多叠加3层。

upgrade.0: 装備したキャラクターの元素熟知の52%を基準に攻撃力がアップする。元素スキルが敵に命中すると、継続時間10秒の「赤砂の夢」効果が発動する。「赤砂の夢」：装備したキャラクターの元素熟知の28%を基準に攻撃力がアップする、この効果は最大3層まで重ね掛け可能。
